Txt_MBR_Info_UI_Guide.Text: What would you like to ask about?

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_003.Text: The monster wrangler's mind is opened to a new world of cordial critter comprehension!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_010.Text: The monster wrangler feels like <IfGender_ACTOR(he now knows,she now knows,they now know)> a little bit about monsters.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_030.Text: The monster wrangler feels like <IfGender_ACTOR(he now knows,she now knows,they now know)> a little bit more about monsters.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_050.Text: The monster wrangler feels like <IfGender_ACTOR(he now knows,she now knows,they now know)> quite a bit more about monsters.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_080.Text: The monster wrangler now has an almost-perfect understanding of monsters.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_UI_MonsterTamer_100.Text: The monster wrangler now feels like a regular monster monitor!

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Start_01.Text: *: Hello! If there's anything you'd like to know about monster arenas, then I'm certain I can be of help.

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Start_02.Text: *: Good day! If you've got any questions about the wonderful world of monster arenas then you're talking to the right person.

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Top_01.Text: *: So, what would you like to know?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Top_02.Text: *: So, what would you like to know?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Quit.Text: *: See you again soon, I hope!

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_01.Text:
*: It's fairly simple really; if you see a mild-mannered critter that stays still long enough for you to pet it, then it can be rescued!<KEY_WAIT>
*: Monty told me he has high hopes for you, so I'm sure you won't have much trouble getting the monsters on side.
<KEY_WAIT>
*: Just remember: you can get as close as you like to friendly creatures and they won't budge an inch; they love making new acquaintances, so be sure to rescue any you bump into on your travels!

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_02.Text:
*: Ah, yes, there are some out there that can be a bit shy like that. They'll scarper the second they get whiff of a human, or hear footsteps.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Your best bet is to work out how to tread a bit more softly, or find a scent that the critters like.<KEY_WAIT>
*: You know, I often wonder how thieves manage to stay so quiet when they're trying to pinch things... Bet they'd be able to rescue plenty of monsters!

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_03.Text:
*: Not a day goes by that I don't consider this very subject. Well, did you know that certain creatures only come out at specific times of day?<KEY_WAIT>
*: Not all of them are morning monsters, you know. Some are only active at night, so make a point of searching at different times. And if you don't fancy waiting around, head to an inn and just sleep until nightfall.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Who knows, there may well be a handful who only come out at dusk too.

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_04.Text:
*: Ah, I was hoping you might ask that! Monster arenas offer critters of a friendlier persuasion a new way of life.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Here, they can test themselves against each other in friendly bouts where they shed blood, sweat and occasionally...ooze.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Oh, and one thing I do want to be clear on: they're called monster <6>arenas<9>, not <6>pits<9>. Some silly so-and-sos call them the latter and it drives me mad.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Regardless, we're all excited to see what new friends you send our way! Try to rescue as many monsters as you can.<KEY_WAIT>
*: And don't be discouraged if you find you can't win at first! The more critters you collect, the better your odds will be.

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_05.Text:
*: Oh, it's easy: just go and talk to the receptionist by the arena entrance.<KEY_WAIT>
*: Worth mentioning that there is an entry fee, but win enough fights and you'll more than make it back.<KEY_WAIT>
*: And just so you're aware: there are monster arenas throughout the realm, and each one has its own ranked tournaments.<KEY_WAIT>
*: The first arena's initial series of brawls are classed rank 1. Win all the rank-1 bouts and you'll be allowed to test yourself against tougher opponents.

Txt_MBR_Info_Msg_Answer_06.Text:
*: Sadly you have to withdraw from the competition if you lose. Don't worry though, you'll still get all the prize money you'd earned up to that point!<KEY_WAIT>
*: Just keep coming back to test yourself and your monsters!<KEY_WAIT>
*: After losing, you'll be taken back to the registration area, and your prized critters will be right as rain to boot. You've got nothing to lose...except the entry fee, I suppose.

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Start_01.Text: Why, hello again! Worried about my many monsters were you? Fret not, they're doing splendidly!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Start_02.Text: Ah, wonderful to see you again. I hear you're finding time to search for friendly monsters alongside all your other commitments. Thank you so much!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Top_01.Text: Since you're here, why don't you go ahead and check in on the little critters?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Top_02.Text: Are there any other monsters you'd like to take a look at?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Top_03.Text: Outstanding... To think you're now able to best the monster monitor himself. My sincerest congratulations!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Quit.Text: Do come back soon now. The monsters love your little visits!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Achieve_Reward_01.Text:
I'd been wondering when I'd see you once more.<KEY_WAIT>
It feels only right that I give you a token of my gratitude, since you've now rescued {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(monster,monsters)>.<KEY_WAIT>
But don't think your work is done; there are plenty more beasties out there awaiting your rescue!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Achieve_Reward_02.Text:
Hello there!<KEY_WAIT>
It pleases me to say you've now saved {VALUE} monsters. What's more, they're all getting along wonderfully!<KEY_WAIT>
Here, a small token of my thanks. Oh, I can't wait to see what critters crawl through my door next.

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Achieve_Reward_03.Text:
Just who I wanted to see!<KEY_WAIT>
You've now sent a whopping {VALUE} monsters our way.<KEY_WAIT>
I consider them my own family, you know. They're a real lovely bunch.<KEY_WAIT>
And I doubt anyone else out there could've hoped to amass such a collection of cuddly critters.<KEY_WAIT>
Allow me to give you something to express my heartfelt gratitude.

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Achieve_Reward_04.Text:
There's my favourite critter collector!<KEY_WAIT>
It may interest you to know that we've now got {VALUE} monsters in our care.<KEY_WAIT>
Truly, I never thought this day would come...<KEY_WAIT>
And it delights me to say they're all happy and healthy as well!<KEY_WAIT>
Now, in light of your remarkable work, I've prepared a true treat for you. The best of luck with all your future endeavours!

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Achieve_Reward_05.Text:
If it isn't the world's most marvellous monster rescuer! It honours me to be in your presence.<KEY_WAIT>
Believe it or not<--->I scarcely can<--->you have sent an incredible {VALUE} monsters our way!<KEY_WAIT>
It boggles the mind to think of all the places you must've been to come face-to-face with so many beasties.<KEY_WAIT>
And I see now just how right I was to trust my gut feeling that fateful day you met Splatrick. No one else could've done what you have.<KEY_WAIT>
Honestly, I struggle to find a superlative to do you justice. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!<KEY_WAIT>
I cannot say if it will help you on your quest, but here is a small something from me.<KEY_WAIT>
Do stop by when you can. The monsters are always telling me how much they miss you.

Txt_MBR_Zoo_Msg_Reward_Excess.Text: Deary me! It seems your bag is overflowing with all manner of things at the moment. I'm afraid I'll just have to hang on to what I was going to give you.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Start_01.Text: *: Welcome to our most hallowed arena, where the world's friendliest<--->yet also mightiest<--->monsters engage in glorious combat!

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Start_02.Text:
*: Thank you for visiting our monster arena. Here, we all subscribe to the notion that a bit of friendly competition, as well as some fighting, can create bonds that last a lifetime!<KEY_WAIT>
*: Ah, worth noting though that it's your monsters that do battle, not you yourself!

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_01.Text: *: Have you come to measure your monsters' might by taking part in a tournament?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_02.Text: *: Have you come to measure your monsters' might by taking part in a tournament?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_Entry.Text: *: Lovely! If you would be so kind as to hand over your entry fee, we can get underway.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_Err_Entry.Text: *: Oh, unfortunately there aren't any tournaments you can take part in at present.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_Err_Rank.Text: *: I admire your enthusiasm, but I think that tournament might still be a bit too tough for you.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Rank_Err_Money.Text: *: Well, this is rather awkward. You don't appear to have enough gold coins to actually take part...

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Party_01.Text: *: Happy with your team? You can always swap someone out now if your gut says you should.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Party_02.Text: *: Ready to rumble, then? Feel free to change up your team now if you think it's worthwhile.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Party_Empty.Text: *: Ah... Your team's looking slightly...depleted at the moment. Why don't you try signing up some monsters?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Monster_01.Text: *: So, who's going to do battle today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Entry_Confirm.Text: *: Splendid. The tournament's about to get underway. Are you ready for your first match?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Entry_Err_Party.Text: *: Hmm, seems like your team is a little lacking in monsters. Let's see if you can find some to fill it up.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Start_Match.Text: *: The {WORD} tournament will be beginning in no time. Contestants, please make your way into the arena!

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Result_Lose.Text: *: Alas, your team wasn't quite up to the challenge.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Result_Win_01.Text: *: It gives me endless pleasure to say that you have won the {WORD} tournament!

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Result_Win_02.Text: *: You were victorious in...{VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(bout,bouts)> which means you have won {VALUE2} gold <IfSing_VALUE2(coin,coins)>.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Result_Win_03.Text:
*: Congratulations on taking the {WORD} tournament by storm! You must be so proud of your team.<KEY_WAIT>
*: I've also prepared a special gift of {VALUE} gold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)> in honour of it being your first time winning this tournament.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Result_Win_04.Text: *: Ah, unfortunately I can't hand over your prize money if you've no room for it on your person.

Txt_MBR_Entry_Msg_Reward_Excess.Text: *: Oh, you don't seem to have any room for your prize right now...

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Success_010.Text: The monster happily heads off to go and greet Monty!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Success_020.Text: The monster gleefully hurries off to go and greet Monty!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Success_030.Text: The monster slowly makes its way to go and greet Monty...

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Success_040.Text: The monster excitedly hurries off to go and greet Monty!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Success_050.Text: Xenlon smiles contentedly and makes his way to go and greet Monty.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_Named.Text: Upon meeting up with Monty, the monster is given a new lease of life and a new name too: {ACTOR}!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_StatusUp.Text:
{ACTOR} is over the moon now they've got more {M_NAME} pals.<KEY_WAIT>
The power of friendship makes {ACTOR} mightier than ever!

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_ZooPrize.Text:
You've now rescued {VALUE} <IfSing_VALUE(monster,monsters)>.<KEY_WAIT>
Perhaps it's time to pay Monty a visit and check up on the little critters in his care.

Txt_MBR_Invitation_Msg_MonsterTamer.Text:
Well done on reaching the {VALUE}-monster milestone!<KEY_WAIT>
You now understand even more than before about how monsters live their lives.
